Number - Less than or equal to

mapper.subject: Got 20 seconds to share your thoughts?
mapper.html:
Hi ,
Hope you've had a chance to explore {{2.properties_value.`Product Name`[].plain_text}} — would love to hear what you thought of it!
If you've already left a review, thank you (seriously — you're the reason I pretend to be functional).

If not, just hit reply or drop a quick note here: Leave a review.
Your feedback helps me improve and also makes me look like I have my life together online.

Heads up — Gumroad is weird. You need to:
  • Be logged into Gumroad
  • Scroll to the bottom of the page
  • Hope the review box appears (we’re at the mercy of the UI gods)

If that sounds like too much, no worries — just hit reply and tell me what you thought. I’ll happily count that as a review (and possibly frame it).

Thanks!
